rooms.description: You're in a cell made of stone.
rooms.detailedDescription: Light is coming through a hole in the ceiling.

features.name: door
features.description: There's a door to the west.
features.detailedDescription: A rotting wooden door. Despite its apparent age, it still looks strong.

features.name: key
features.description: A key sits on the floor in the middle of the pool of light coming through the hole in the ceiling.
features.detailedDescription: Key to a cell in the Undead Asylum.
